name: Jokers Gambit
description:
Take control of the diciest casino in town! Can both be played in the browser, as well be downloaded!

Play as the Joker card, in an attempt to take over a shady casino. The cooperate ladders of kings- & queen cards trying their best to hold you back. This is a short experience made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam but wasn’t finished on time. Now you can play a proper version of the game, though still messy.

Reviews! "Damn, actually pretty well made, with the cards & movement" - Parac "Wow, this is great sonny" - Dad (Jk, he left years ago ;-;) "7.8/10, too much water" - Fede Soundtrack! The soundtrack is available on YouTube & Soundcloud! YouTube Link Soundcloud Link - Jokers Gambit Menu Song Soundcloud Link - A Joker Up Your Sleeve Credits! The Team:

Alexander

Andreas

Frederik

Elkiær

Assets:
  • Dice Set by Jeremy Eyring
  • Poker Chips by Jarlan Perez
  • Casino Audio by Kenney
  • Arcade SFX by Mrmayo
  • Furniture Kit by Kenney
  • Minigolf Kit by Kenney
  • Fantasy Town Kit by Kenney
Original game! The actual game we made in 48 hours: 

https://frederikdv.itch.io/jokers-gambit-jam-version
